A4.text: It comprises England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.

A5.text: The United Kingdom includes the island of Great Britain, the northâ€‘eastern part of the island of Ireland, and most of the smaller islands within the British Isles.

A6.text: The capital and largest city of both England and the UK is London.

A7.text: Edinburgh, Cardiff and Belfast are the national capitals of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
